duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages the conduct, development, and promotion of clinical research, collaborating with Research Administration.
Interacts with leadership, medical staff, and clinical providers to identify opportunities for clinical research, program grants, and clinical drug trials.
Assures compliance, prioritizes, and provides oversight to clinical research activities and faculty.
Serves as a liaison to Industry partners, community healthcare providers, and academic institutions to grow clinical research in the community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a scientific discipline (Master’s preferred)
